title_localized.en: Do you need a credit card to book a reservation with Apple Core Hotels?

faq_content_localized.en:
All reservations must be guaranteed with a major credit card. The hotel will check the card's validity up to 48 hours prior to the date of arrival by taking an approval for the first night (room charge + taxes). If your card is unable to be validated, the reservation will be canceled with no guarantee of a room upon arrival.

Guests can change mode of payment on check-in to cash if they wish.

Business travelers coming to Apple Core Hotels may use a company credit card, however, our hotels will only recognize company cards on which your name and the company's name are present and visible.
